title.rendered: Why is  Voice Search the Secret Ingredient?

content.rendered:
[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” text_font_size=”15px”]Voice Search on Smartphone or any other devices is likely to give the best benefit. Now, over the decades, these features have enhanced over time; they are becoming more usable and popular. In other words, Voice Search SEO is developing better technology and means for small business owners and professionals to acquire immense benefits out of their platforms. They are making it so simple that person only needs to speak the words in front of the devices and results are pulled from the internet to the user on the screen.

According to sources, Voice Search and inputs have outperformed the human typing capacity as the former can provide an input of approximately 150 words per minute whereas the latter can be possible to the extent of 40 words in a minute. With the rise in technology, it is expected that Voice Search will soon take over the search engine market as well as Internet-connected devices such as internet of things and smart home features.

The only setback Voice Search it’s facing is the accent and the background noise that can throw the platform. In other words, the Voice Search facility requires effectiveness that could not only help the speech impediments but also act as a learning model when it comes to new names or words.

The smartest companies involved in this sector of Voice Search

1. Baidu

Incorporated on 18 January 2000 this multinational company’ voice assistant Baidu is often referred to as the “Google” in the Chinese territories. Because of the software of deep search 2, it is able to understand and identify the spoken words. With Google being blocked by the communist group, this has become the easy solution that understands both English and Mandarin.

2. Hound

Founded by SoundHound Inc in 2005 this app is compatible with both Android and Apple devices. The Voice Search Optimisation feature is allowing the user to use the natural voice, which means that it can follow the commands of the local accent and provide very speedy information and responses. Because of the features, it’s worth giving a shot with this.
[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://AA Group.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/07/voice-search-1792301_1280.png” align_tablet=”center” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” align_phone=”center”] 
[/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” text_font_size=”15px”]

3. Google now

This Google Assistant is giving a very easy solution when it comes to two-way interaction using natural voice. The assistant not only provides the service of information using the internet but it also provides the functions of scheduling events and adjusting the hardware features on the user’s device. The Google, now, can perform the search of pictures and graphics on the devices.

4. Siri

This is a part of Apple Inc that provides the natural user interface to only apple devices. It is spinning off a project that was originally developed by SRI International to provide speech recognition engine. It provides all the basic features as Google when it comes to iPhone models; it is basically engaged with iOS supportable apps.

5. Wit.ai

Developed by Palo Alto has been acquired by Facebook in 2015. It provides the automation services, voice-controlled posts, and messenger services. The Facebook is still working on various projects regarding this Voice Search assistant.

6. Microsoft Cortana

Cortana is a virtual assistant created by windows for windows accessories and operating system. It performs the functions of the search engine over the internet, sets up the calendar, and creates messages. The Microsoft has modified it to be available in various languages. This app is giving a good competition when it comes to the other Voice Search assistants.
[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://AA Group.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/07/echo-dot-2937627_1920.jpg” align_tablet=”center” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” align_phone=”center”] 
[/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” text_font_size=”15px”]

7. Amazon Alexa

Amazon Alexa, which is developed by Amazon, has already performed a great business in the Voice Search Optimization sector. This is capable of performing a plethora of services in the form of voice interaction, setting alarms and other services. The Alexa App is compatible with both android and apple devices.
There is a massive shift in the industry as these consumers are using the latest digital equipment to stay ahead of the competition. People are using more Voice Search facility more than the text search facility.
After knowing the players in this Voice Search assistant the question arises on how to optimize Voice Search SEO. Who is smarter? Are Amazon Alexa Skills are worth enough to provide the outcome in a fast manner or Google Voice Search can provide an easy solution to all the business problems and professional issues?
In this competition of Google v/s Amazon, companies are trying to play their games in the manner that will give them the overall domination in the spectrum. Over the decades, the Google has impressively, taken over the sector of text search engine. They are taking bold steps to maintain this success in case of Voice Search technology. Globally, the Alexa app has a stronghold in the Voice Search assistant.

The following are the simple steps that answer the question of optimizing Voice Search:

1. The natural language with long keywords

The term natural language has been an issue when it comes to the Voice Search. Longer words make it more difficult for the Voice Search assistant to search any query. So to reduce the loose ends, Voice Search assistants are being upgraded.
It is a well-known fact that voice is faster than typing. Therefore, to enhance the optimization technique one needs to use certain keywords that could make the process work faster. By enhancing the keywords, the essential components of the Voice Search assistant start functioning. In this process, a person needs to use the words as simple, as possible, so that it is easier for the assistant to follow and provide solutions. Since the Voice Search is an exploding platform in today’s world; a user needs to take certain steps to execute a strategic search facility In a nutshell, using relevant, lucid, and precise tail keywords can enhance and integrate the search faster.

2. Planning before execution

After evaluating the keywords and turning them into question, the next step is to produce new contents that are short and lucid. Due to the precise contents, the Voice Search assistants, such as Google Voice Search or Amazon Alexa, would be able to click such website that could help produce better results. Also, the user needs to understand the mode of search, as to what type of search work well on mobiles and other devices instead of a desktop. Moreover, there are certain types of queries that work on specific apps only. So, a fair idea of the workability of the apps is also necessary, which precisely includes the error percentage of the apps.
One should re-strategize the approach, by starting the requests, after structuring it with the keywords like who, what, where, when, why, how, near me etc. As such it will make sure that the mobile experience is speedy, friendly and lucid to the extent possible.

3. Mobile SEO

The mobile phone has become a necessity these days, so Mobile SEO is getting importance too. So, the question is as to how to enhance Mobile SEO experiences. The answer is obvious that these Voice Search assistants need to perform better on the configurations of web designs and quick response. In this case, the user needs to avoid common mistakes such as blocking of important web supporting apps such as Java, C++ etc, non-testing of the mobile-friendly pages and avoiding a mobile audit.

Conclusions-

The Voice Search is going to impact our lives in the future as it is going to become a part of everyday life. Do you think voice search will become the new way of searching? If not, is it even worth optimizing for? Let us know what you think in the comments.
